summary: Remove deprecated fields marked with 'Should be removed' comments and convert them to reserved fields in the API. Also address any remaining TODO comments found during cleanup.
userImpact: Removes cleanup work and ensures deprecated API fields are properly marked as reserved to prevent accidental reuse.
rootCause: Fields marked for removal in PR #121 were left with comments instead of being properly converted to reserved to avoid mixing comment and structural changes.
proposedFix: Remove the 'Should be removed' comments and mark the fields as reserved; address any TODO comments found during the process.
keyQuote: Remove them and mark them as reserved. Was not done in that PR to avoid doing any non-comments changes.
